where.if: AND (UPPER(sj) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{searchValue}),'%') OR UPPER(cn) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{searchValue}),'%'))

mapper.select: SELECT qna_id, cl_code, sj, cn, answ, file_id, answ_file_id, answ_rgst_id, answ_rgst_dt, bf_qna_id, use_yn, rgst_id, rgst_dt, modi_id, modi_dt, qna_stat, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM T_CODE WHERE GROUP_ID = 'QNA_STAT_CODE' AND CODE_ID = qna_stat) AS qna_stat_nm, open_yn, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM T_CODE WHERE GROUP_ID = 'OPEN_YN' AND CODE_ID = open_yn) AS open_yn_nm, view_cnt FROM t_bbs_qna

SELECT tbq.qna_id, tbq.cl_code, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM T_CODE WHERE GROUP_ID = 'QNA_CAT' AND CODE_ID = tbq.cl_code) AS qna_cate_nm, tbq.sj, tbq.cn, tbq.answ, tbq.file_id, tbq.answ_file_id, tbq.answ_rgst_id, tbq.answ_rgst_dt, tbq.bf_qna_id, tbq.use_yn, tbq.rgst_id, tbq.rgst_dt, tbq.modi_id, tbq.modi_dt, tbq.qna_stat, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM T_CODE WHERE GROUP_ID = 'QNA_STAT_CODE' AND CODE_ID = tbq.qna_stat) AS qna_stat_nm, tbq.open_yn, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM T_CODE WHERE GROUP_ID = 'OPEN_YN' AND CODE_ID = tbq.open_yn) AS open_yn_nm, tbq.view_cnt, tu.user_nm as rgst_nm, (select dept_nm from t_dept where dept_code = tu.dept_code) as rgst_dept_nm, (select pstn_nm from t_pstn where pstn_code = tu.pstn_code) as rgst_pstn_nm, tf.file_url as rgst_photo_url FROM t_bbs_qna tbq left outer join t_user tu on tbq.rgst_id = tu.user_id left outer join t_file tf on tu.file_url = tf.file_id WHERE tbq.qna_id = #{qnaId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_bbs_qna SET qna_stat = #{qnaStat}, modi_id = #{modiId}, modi_dt = now(), answ = #{answ}, answ_rgst_id = #{answRgstId}, answ_rgst_dt = now(), open_yn = #{openYn}, use_yn = #{useYn} WHERE qna_id = #{qnaId}
UPDATE t_bbs_qna SET use_yn = 'N', modi_id = #{modiId}, modi_dt = now() WHERE qna_id = #{qnaId}
